EmailTemplate.subject: Re: Pivotal @ Chief Data Officer Leadership Forum – Apologies for the missing links!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<http://pivotal.io> It was great to see you at the Chief Data Officer Leadership Forum
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Sir/ Madam}},
We hope you had a chance to listen to Simon Elisha, Pivotal’s CTO present on Day 2 on "Connecting Data with Customers - Bridging the gap between Data Science and Applications" and to drop by the Pivotal stand.
Given your focus on all things data, we thought you might be interested in the following:
A fascinating use case on Indian Railways and how they are managing their volume of data - see it here. <http://www.pivotal.io/sites/default/files/Indian%20Railways_Case%20Study%20120914.pdf>
A Data Sheet on 5 Tips for Building Engaging, Data-Driven Mobile Apps - see it here. <http://www.pivotal.io/sites/default/files/5%20Tips_building%20engaging%2C%20data-driven%20mobile%20apps.pdf>
You can also join our podcast series here. <http://www.pivotal.io/podcasts> Every week, host Simon Elisha will share the latest news, interview Pivotal technologists, and explore how people are harnessing sophisticated data and cloud technologies to build applications that achieve extraordinary things.
Subscribe to our blog <http://blog.pivotal.io/> and get a range of updates about trends, use cases and interesting facts about data.
Or just simply browse our website: www.pivotal.io <http://www.pivotal.io> Sincerely,
Pivotal Team
